::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus embraces his wife, holding her close and tight.

Rodimus: I'll come back from this. I promise you. The Matrix picked me to be it's champion. To fight evil like this. It's my destiny to face tyrants like this Decepticon; but when the day is done I'll still be coming home to my family.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Nightlight 
 
 "Promise me that you will come back, that nothing will happen you... I 
 couldnt live without you..." said Nightlightwhile she huged him
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus: I'm hoping he doesn't have one. He's probably independent 
 of any factions here. If we locate him out in the open and alone then 
 I believe I'll have a chance.
